gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 133, Pistons 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Lakers defeated the Pistons, 133-107. D'Angelo Russell recorded a game-high 35 points and nine assists for the Lakers, while Anthony Davis added 28 points, 16 rebounds and three blocks in the victory. Cade Cunningham tallied 15 points and five assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Lakers improve to 11-8 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 2-16.
